mapper.select:
select e.id, e.numero, e.fecha, e.hora, e.proveedor_id, e.orden_compra_id, e.facturado, e.actualizado, e.estado, e.total_monto, e.factura_proveedor_id, e.empresa_id, e.user_id, e.activo, e.borrado, e.created_at, e.updated_at, e.almacen_id,
a.id as al_id, a.nombre as al_nombre, a.direccion as al_direccion, a.empresa_id as al_empresa_id, a.user_id as al_user_id, a.activo as al_activo, a.borrado as al_borrado, a.distrito_id as al_distrito_id, a.codigo as al_codigo,
u.id as user_id, u.name as user_name, u.email as user_email, u.tipo_user_id as user_tipo_user_id, u.user_id as user_user_id, u.empresa_id as user_empresa_id, u.activo as user_activo, u.borrado as user_borrado, u.almacen_id as user_almacen_id,
du.id as du_id, du.nombres as du_nombres, du.apellido_paterno as du_apellido_paterno, du.apellido_materno as du_apellido_materno, du.direccion as du_direccion, du.telefono as du_telefono, du.tipo_documento_id as du_tipo_documento_id, du.documento as du_documento, du.email as du_email, du.user_id as du_user_id, du.user_gestiona_id as du_user_gestiona_id, du.empresa_id as du_empresa_id, du.activo as du_activo, du.borrado as du_borrado,
p.id as pro_id, p.tipo_documento_id as pro_tipo_documento_id, p.documento as pro_documento, p.nombre as pro_nombre, p.direccion as pro_direccion, p.telefono as pro_telefono, p.anexo as pro_anexo, p.celular as pro_celular, p.responsable as pro_responsable, p.activo as pro_activo, p.borrado as pro_borrado, p.user_id as pro_user_id, p.empresa_id as pro_empresa_id, p.created_at as pro_created_at, p.updated_at as pro_updated_at,
f.id as co_id, f.tipo_comprobante_id as co_tipo_comprobante_id, f.serie as co_serie, f.numero as co_numero, f.fecha as co_fecha, f.estado as co_estado, f.observaciones as co_observaciones, f.user_id as co_user_id, f.empresa_id as co_empresa_id, f.activo as co_activo, f.borrado as co_borrado, f.created_at as co_created_at, f.updated_at as co_updated_at, f.almacen_id as co_almacen_id,
TRUNCATE(@a:= e.total_monto,2) AS importe_total, TRUNCATE(@b:=(SELECT IFNULL(SUM(pp.`monto_real`),0.00) As montoCobrado FROM `pago_proveedors` pp WHERE pp.`entrada_stock_id`=e.`id` and pp.borrado !='1'),2) AS monto_pagado, TRUNCATE(@a-@b,2) AS monto_por_pagar
from entrada_stocks e inner join almacens a on a.id = e.almacen_id inner join users u on u.id = e.user_id left join datos_users du on du.user_id = u.id left join proveedors p on p.id = e.proveedor_id left join factura_proveedors f on f.id = e.factura_proveedor_id
mapper.update:
update entrada_stocks
numero = #{NUMERO}, fecha = #{FECHA}, hora = #{HORA}, proveedor_id = #{PROVEEDOR_ID}, proveedor_id = NULL, orden_compra_id = #{ORDEN_COMPRA_ID}, facturado = #{FACTURADO}, actualizado = #{ACTUALIZADO}, estado = #{ESTADO}, total_monto = #{TOTAL_MONTO}, factura_proveedor_id = #{FACTURA_PROVEEDOR_ID},
user_id = #{USER_ID}, activo = #{ACTIVO}, borrado = #{BORRADO}, almacen_id = #{ALMACEN_ID},
factura_proveedor_id = null,
updated_at = #{UPDATED_AT},
where id=#{ID} and empresa_id=#{EMPRESA_ID}
